TopicTitle: Suggestion: Make a subforum for missions that require mods

Articles.Content:
As I understand it, the new Mission Builder in Making History allows for making missions that require mods. I suggest making a sub-forum to the Making History Missions forum dedicated to missions that require mods. This way it would be easier to find missions suited for a vanilla game or a modded game to suit your install.

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/forum/98-making-history-missions/

 

 

 

Edited March 13, 2018 by MaltYebisu
